reference.title: Map based linking (maplink and move-links)
reference.shortdesc: These two steps work together to create links based on a map and move those links into referenced topics. The links are created based on hierarchy (parent/child), the collection-type attribute (sequential or family links), and relationship tables.

section.p: The maplink module first runs an XSLT program that evaluates the map, and places all generated links into a single file in the temporary processing directory. Once that file is created, the move-links module runs a Java program that pushes the generated links into the proper topics.
